org.ltj.cryptoeditor.crypto.encryption

Interface Cryptographer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BCCryptographer

    public interface Cryptographer
    Describes the interface for encrypting and decrypting using various methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String input, Encryption encryption, javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
      Symmetrically decrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters and the given key.
      java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String password, Encryption encryption)
      Symmetrically decrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters and PBE.
      java.lang.String decryptRsa(java.lang.String input, java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey privateKey)
      Asymmetrically decrypts the given String using the RSA algorithm.
      HashDecryptionResult decryptWithHash(HashPayload payload, Encryption encryption, javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
      Symmetrically decrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters, the given key and checks the validity of the checksum.
      HashDecryptionResult decryptWithHash(HashPayload payload, java.lang.String password, Encryption encryption)
      Symmetrically decrypts the given String with a password and the given encryption parametersand checks the validity of the checksum.
      java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input, Encryption encryption, javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
      Symmetrically encrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters and the given key.
      java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String password, Encryption encryption)
      Symmetrically encrypts the given String with PBE and the given encryption parameters.
      java.lang.String encryptRsa(java.lang.String input, java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey publicKey)
      Asymmetrically encrypts the given String using the RSA algorithm.
      HashPayload encryptWithHash(java.lang.String input, Encryption encryption, javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
      Symmetrically encrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters, the given key and appends an SHA-1 hash.
      HashPayload encryptWithHash(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String password, Encryption encryption)
      Symmetrically encrypts the given String with a password and the given encryption parameters and appends an SHA-1 hash.
      java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey generatePrivateKey(java.lang.String modulo, java.lang.String privateExponent)
      Generates an RSAPrivateKey.
      java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey generatePublicKey(java.lang.String modulo)
      Generates an RSAPublicKey based on the given modulo.

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input,
                         Encryption encryption,
                         javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
                  throws CryptographyException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Symmetrically encrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters and the given key.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to be encrypted
        encryption - the encryption parameters
        key - the key to use in the encryption
        Returns:
        the encrypted ciphertext.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        CryptographyException

      • encrypt

        java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String input,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         Encryption encryption)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Symmetrically encrypts the given String with PBE and the given encryption parameters.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to be encrypted
        password - the String to use as a password for PBE
        encryption - the encryption parameters
        Returns:
        the encrypted ciphertext.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

                         Encryption encryption,
                         javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
                  throws CryptographyException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Symmetrically decrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters and the given key.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to be decrypted
        encryption - the encryption parameters
        key - the key to use in the encryption
        Returns:
        the decrypted plaintext.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • encryptWithHash

        HashPayload encryptWithHash(java.lang.String input,
                            Encryption encryption,
                            javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Symmetrically encrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters, the given key and appends an SHA-1 hash.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to be encrypted
        encryption - the encryption parameters
        key - the key to use in the encryption
        Returns:
        the encrypted ciphertext appended by the hash
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • decryptWithHash

        HashDecryptionResult decryptWithHash(HashPayload payload,
                                     Encryption encryption,
                                     javax.crypto.SecretKey key)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Symmetrically decrypts the given String with the given encryption parameters, the given key and checks the validity of the checksum.
        Parameters:
        payload - the String to be decrypted
        encryption - the encryption parameters
        key - the key to use in the decryption
        Returns:
        the decrypted plaintext and the validity of the checksum
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

                            java.lang.String password,
                            Encryption encryption)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Symmetrically encrypts the given String with a password and the given encryption parameters and appends an SHA-1 hash.
        Parameters:
        input - the String to be encrypted
        password - the password to be used for PBE
        encryption - the encryption parameters
        Returns:
        the encrypted ciphertext appended by the hash
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

        password - the password to be used for PBE
        encryption - the encryption parameters
